data.eml:eml: Nesting biology of Paragymnomerus signaticollis tauricus (Kostylev, 1940) (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fateryga, Alexander V. (2018): Nesting biology of Paragymnomerus signaticollis tauricus (Kostylev, 1940) (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae). Zootaxa 4378 (3): 429-441, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.3.10
